name: Psycho Dream
overview: Don't come... don't look for me... 1992, winter. Two debuggers, Shijima Ryu and Tobari Maria, dive into the mind of a girl taking permanent refuge in the virtual world while abandoning her physical body to atrophy. The girl, now a Sinker, must be saved from the D movie virtual world named "The Story of the Abandoned City." What they saw in that deep turn... A cult action game that mixes 8 worlds with madness.
